LearningItemProgress.name: LearningItemProgress
LearningItemProgress.description: Represents the progress that a user has made towards completing an assigned learning item, such as a Learning Paths entry or Enablement program.

CompletedDate.description: The date when the user completed the learning item.

CompletedOnDay.description: Number of days that the user took to complete the learning item.

CompletedPercent.description: Percentage of the learning item thatâ€™s complete.

DaysInProgress.description: Number of days that have elapsed since the learning item was assigned.

LearningItemId.description: The ID of the learning item. This field is a relationship field.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of the learning item. This field is a relationship field.

ProgressStatus.description: Status of the learning item assignment. Possible values are: Behind Completed CompletedLate CompletedOnTime InProgress NoLongerTracking NotStarted OnTrack Overdue For details, see Completion Statuses in Enablement Analytics.

StartDate.description: The date when a user starts a Trailhead exercise in a sales program.
